title.text: From Planning to Actions: Realizing Intentions by Rhetorical Means

introductionContent.text: This essay describes experiences made in connection with tile consultation system WISBER and with the expla.nation device DIAMOD], featuring tile role of intentions in the former and the role of rhetoric in the latter.
Assessing the results obtained, we clarify our standpoint concerning the workshop topic, emphasizing on future prospects for text. planning.
